com.box.sdk

Interface ProgressListener


  • public interface ProgressListener
    The listener interface for monitoring the progress of a long-running API call.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onProgressChanged(long numBytes, long totalBytes)
      Invoked when the progress of the API call changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onProgressChanged

        void onProgressChanged(long numBytes,
                       long totalBytes)
        Invoked when the progress of the API call changes. In case of file uploads which are coming from a dynamic stream the file size cannot be determined and total bytes will be reported as -1.
        Parameters:
        numBytes - the number of bytes completed.
        totalBytes - the total number of bytes.
